name: Edward's Sewer Adventure
description:
"I'm going to tell you the story, the story of how I got lost in the sewers..."

In Edward's Sewer Adventure

  • You explore the depths of the sewers found on Pine Island. Located beneath the city, hidden from plain sight, many things can take place in the dark. Strange noises have been recorded. Are you brave enough to venture into the dark and damp smelly sewers? Or are you chicken...
  • You will meet friends unlooked for and evil forces on your journey.
  • You will experience revolutionary 3D-Graphics. A true stable of cutting edge PSX technology.
"I like my own game. Most times... only if they are fun. 12/10" -Erathor

Will you make it out safe and survive the monster?

This game is the official prequel to No Time - A Time Travel Experience https://store.steampowered.com/app/1043340/No_Time/

Join my community on Discord

https://discord.gg/EG2wkT7

Minimal/Medium Requirements:

POTATO/TOASTER

Keyboard:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Space - Jump

F - Toggle Flashlight

Right Mouse - Use Item

Left Mouse - Interact/ With Held Item

MouseWheel - Scroll through inventory LShift - Sprint Mode
